title: Main A96 closed near Huntly as man badly hurt in collision
article: A motorist has been taken to hospital with serious injuries following a crash in Aberdeenshire which closed the main A96 road. Fire, ambulance and police crews were called to the two-vehicle crash near Huntly which happened at about 09:15. The road was closed in both directions as a result, with diversions in place. Police Scotland said one man was taken to Aberdeen Royal Infirmary.
